banner.title: Manage Your Real Estate Portfolio Online
banner.subtitle: Curated, Advised, Delivered
banner.subText: India’s exclusive platform for end-to-end real estate wealth management

Achievements.description: Clients Across India and Global Markets

Accordions.title: Individuals & Families
Accordions.content: We work with affluent individuals, entrepreneurs, and legacy-driven families who view real estate as a key pillar of their long-term wealth strategy. Our advisory combines deep market insight, access to exclusive opportunities, and portfolio management expertise helping them grow and preserve their real estate wealth with confidence and clarity.

Accordions.title: Family Offices
Accordions.content: We serve both established and emerging family offices offering institutional-grade structuring, performance management, and long-term strategy for their real estate portfolios. From acquisition and consolidation to governance and intergenerational transfer, we ensure every asset aligns with the family’s wealth philosophy.

Accordions.title: Non-Resident Indians (NRIs)
Accordions.content: We assist global investors in acquiring, managing, and monetizing real estate in India, from portfolio setup and legal coordination to ongoing yield optimization and repatriation. With our tech-enabled platform and on-ground expertise, we make investing in Indian real estate seamless and strategic.

Accordions.title: Institutional Investors & Partners
Accordions.content: We collaborate with developers, fund managers, and institutional investors on high-value opportunities including land aggregation, leasing, and capital market–linked projects. Our insight-led approach ensures precision in deal structuring, execution, and long-term partnership outcomes.

features.title: Invest
features.description: Curated real estate opportunities across India’s most promising markets, backed by diligence, data, and deep advisory insight. Build and diversify your real estate portfolio with confidence.

features.title: Transact
features.description: Unlock value through intelligent real estate transactions from acquisitions and divestments to portfolio restructuring. Every deal is backed by analysis, strategy, and precision execution.

features.title: PREFO
features.description: A bespoke real estate wealth advisory for family offices and affluent investors. We manage, structure, and preserve multi-asset portfolios with institutional-grade governance and long-term vision.

testimonials.name: Raghav Mehta
testimonials.feedback: “myfollo has brought an institutional level of discipline to our family’s real estate portfolio. Their perspective goes far beyond transactions, it’s about strategy, timing, and legacy. Every interaction reflects an understanding of what long-term wealth truly means.”
testimonials.position: Joint Managing Director - Kinetic Motor Company Ltd.

testimonials.name: Neha Kapoor
testimonials.feedback: “What differentiates myfollo is how seamlessly they combine insight and execution. From curating investments to providing complete visibility through their dashboard, the experience feels as refined as private banking, but for real estate.”

testimonials.name: Arjun Sethi
testimonials.feedback: “Real estate decisions often lack data, structure, or clarity. With myfollo, we found a team that leads with intelligence and delivers with precision. Their advice is never reactive, it’s guided by a genuine understanding of wealth and responsibility.”
